Name: Aegisblade - Mirrorlight
Description: Its surface is smooth, reflecting light. its blade is sharp, capable of cutting hair. its momentum is unstoppable, slashing like a stream of light!

Description2$english: After equipped, the weapon style will be replaced with: Aegisblade - Mirrorlight.
